name: "Return to Earth"
description:
Our hero is far from home.

You are Adam, a space warrior. He is far from earth, and he must return to earth. Can you help him fight the evil bosses and reach Earth?

This game was created with GameMaker 8.1. Making it has taken around 7 months.

Return to Earth has 61 levels. You can beat it in 5 hours at most. You will fight with 9 bosses and meet 6 different weapons.

Enjoy our game!

Minimum System Requirements:

OS: Windows XP or newer

CPU: 1.5 gigahertz with one core

RAM: 1 gigabyte.

DirectX: Version 8

Video card and display must support 800 × 600 screen resolution at least.

Other: Keyboard and Mouse
